## Primitive.dispose() method

Disposes the primitive

**Signature:**

```typescript
dispose(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

The vertex buffers and index buffer will also be disposed. To prevent specific vertex buffer or index buffer to be disposed, call removeVertexBuffer() or setIndexBuffer(null) first.
